meanings.definition: A high-protein meat substitute made from wheat gluten.
meanings.sent1: I tried a new recipe using seitan for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The seitan in the stir-fry added a nice texture to the dish.
meanings.sent3: The seitan pretended to be a juicy steak at the barbecue.
meanings.sent4: Her love for seitan was as strong as her love for real meat.
meanings.sent5: The seitan looked like a sponge but tasted like a delicious protein source.

meanings.definition: To cook or prepare food using seitan as the main ingredient.
meanings.sent1: She decided to seitan the stew for a healthier option.
meanings.sent2: We often seitan our meals to add variety to our diet.
meanings.sent3: The chef seitaned the entire menu for the vegan festival.
meanings.sent4: He seitaned the dish with care, ensuring it was flavorful.
meanings.sent5: Seitaning the dish brought out a unique taste that surprised everyone.
